title: End-to-End Integration Testing and Cross-Session Persistence Validation
description: Create comprehensive end-to-end tests that validate the complete dashboard widget customization workflow and ensure all acceptance criteria are met. This includes testing widget library browsing, adding/removing widgets, drag-and-drop rearrangement, responsive layout behavior, and cross-session persistence using the existing storage abstractions. Acceptance criteria: Complete user workflow tests pass (add/remove/rearrange widgets), cross-session persistence verified across browser refreshes, responsive layout tests pass on mobile/tablet/desktop viewports, drag-and-drop functionality tests pass on both mouse and touch devices, all 6 acceptance criteria from the user story are validated and documented.
